dialogues.text: All right, Kenny.  Thanks.  You're off the hook.  For now. Carter and Lee move for the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure you guys don't want to stay and have a bite?  My wife's got the best mu shu this side of Compton. Carter and Lee exchange a look as we CUT TO:  EXT. REIGN PLAZA - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishing.  Carter and Lee park their car and walk ins

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter and Lee enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to a worker)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking for a guy named Zing.  Is he here? Zing hears Carter, turns and sees them.  Then RUNS.  Cart and Lee exchange looks and run after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zing sprints down an employee hallway, through a doorway down some stairs.  Carter and Lee in pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter and Lee burst out the door at the bottom of the stairway -- coming almost face to face with --

dialogues.speaker: HU LI
dialogues.text: Who has her gun out.  Waiting for them.  ISABELLA is stan near by, and ZING is visible off to the side.  An 18-WHEE in the loading bay is just being shut and locked.  A LIMO parked beside it. Lee and Carter both assume fighting positions.  When most the other WORKERS pull guns; other TRIAD SOLDIERS step ou putting their guns close on Lee and Carter.  They can't b without getting mowed down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The great Chief Inspector Lee -- I will be remembered for ridding the Triads of your petulance. Hu Li savors the moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you just said I have no business being here, 'cos I was just leaving. Carter starts to leave, and Hu Li trains her gun on him, freezing him in his tracks.  Isabella slowly walks severa feet, ending up behind Lee as she speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hu Li, I think there's someone who will want to talk to them first. Hu Li looks at Isabella, nods an acknowledgement.  BANG! falls.  Isabella's knocked him out from behind with the b of her gun. BANG!  Carter drops to one knee as Hu Li POUNDS him acros the jaw with her fist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...oh, that's a filling right there.  That's gonna cost you. Hu Li lunges forward and KICKS Carter, sending him backwa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put them in the truck. The WORKERS pick up Lee, bring him to the back of the tru

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should kill you right now, but I'm gonna let you live, 'cause you're fine, and maybe you can be reformed. The WORKERS start towards Carter.  He holds up his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more hitting.  I'll get in the truck myself. As Carter walks towards the truck by Hu Li, they exchange look of sheer hatred.  As soon as he passes by her, Hu Li COLDCOCKS Carter with her gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The eighteen wheeler, the limo and the black Lincoln Town pull out of the loading dock, headed for the highway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck pulls onto a HIGHWAY, the LIMO close behind it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEE and CARTER are in the back with crates filled with MO They're both in pain, trying to recover from the head blo Carter is flexing his battered body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the first thing I told you -- never trust nobody.  How could you fall for that shit?  I knew she was dirty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She saved our lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For how long?  Face it, Lee, she's playing both sides. Lee looks disappointed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, man I'm sorry.  I know you got a thing for her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh, my head hurts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm about to be killed and you "Shhh" me!  This wasn't my case, Lee.  Ricky Tan didn't kill my father, the Fu-Cang Long are not in South Central.  I didn't have to help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did you help me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter. Lee thinks about this for a BEAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not used to having a partner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are not partners.  Between your daddy, my daddy, and the beating I just took, as far as I can tell all partners get you is dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well we're not friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got that right.  And we ain't brothers.  Maybe we should just end this right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't talk to you, you don't talk to me.  We'll die in peace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you in the next world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe in reincarnation.  So I won't see you in the next world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe in heaven.  You people believe in heaven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  We have heaven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it the same heaven, or is it a Chinese heaven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's a Chinese heaven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought it might be like those five foot and under basketball leagues.  They don't let everybody in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we should stop talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine by me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You thinking about that girl that dumped you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If she was the right girl, you'd be thinking about her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mind your own business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How was the sex?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was no sex.  She was very traditional.  We were waiting until we were married.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're kidding.  No sex?  Nothing?  No mu-shu?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No mu-shu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about a little king pao chicken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No kung pao chicken.  Never.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steamed dumplings?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once in a while, steamed dumplings.  But only when she was drunk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's rough, man.  If I don't get steamed dumplings once a week, I go crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me the truth, Carter.  Do you think I have a good voice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you serious?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it.  It doesn't matter. Lee turns away from Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As long as you're asking...I think you have a pretty good voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it.  What does she know.  You want me to sing something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That depends.  How do the Fu-Cang-Long usually kill their victims?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll probably torture us first, shock our privates, then put two bullets in our eyes and one in the back of the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead.  Sing your ass off. Lee clears his voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you happen to see the most beautiful girl in the world...and if you did, was she crying, crying...hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The 18-WHEELER drives by followed by the LIMO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hu Li and Isabella sit in the back of one of the limos th is driving behind the truck.  Hu Li is on the car phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, the plates are safe.  Yes, the dragon's been fed. She HANGS UP and glances at Isabella, who is doing her be to appear completely uninterested.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LIMO splits off from the 18-WHEELER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter works at opening one of the crates.  Lee steps up, takes a deep breath, searches the crate looking for the s spot, and PUNCHES a hole in one of the thick boards.  The start prying the crate open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's focus.  Every opponent has a weak spot.  You ignore everything around you, and put all your energy into one perfect strike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll remember that next time I'm fighting a box. Carter opens the crate -- it's filled with SUPERBILLS, ab $1,000,000 worth.  He tosses a stack to Lee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Benjamin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's Benjamin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benjamin Franklin, he discovered electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Chinese man discovered electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No Chinese man discovered electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes he did.  He also invented the bicycle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that I believe. Carter pockets two stacks of superbills.  Lee looks at hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never know.  Besides, I always wanted to die rich. The truck lurches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're slowing down.  This must be it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: End of the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been a good friend, James Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no you don't.  Don't you be getting corny on me, Lee.  I'll kick your ass from here to Compton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could never kick my ass.  You mama's boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you talk about my mama. (winks at Lee)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's more like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck is parked in the underground loading docks.  It approached by FOUR TRIAD SOLDIERS.  Soldier #1 opens the TRUCK'S DOUBLE DOORS to find. Lee and Carter are gone.  Except for boxes of money, the truck bed is EMPTY. Two soldiers enter the truck bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter WEDGED up against the CEILING of the truck bed.  Above the doors and over the soldiers. Lee and Carter SWING DOWN in unison -- knocking both sold to the ground.  In the next instant:

dialogues.speaker: ON LEE
dialogues.text: still holding on to the door frame -- swings and backflip onto the roof of the truck.

dialogues.speaker: ON CARTER
dialogues.text: who swings onto the ground -- grabbing one of the guards use a shield as gunfire erupts. Lee jumps off the truck, knocking the last guard to the ground.  He then grabs the guard Carter is using as a shi and together THEY SWING him into the truck -- KNOCKING DO the first two guards. Carter and Lee slam the back doors SHUT -- bolting them CLOSED and run like hell - scrambling into what looks lik the closest way out: A LARGE OPEN PIPE on the side of the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter run through - it extends out from the underground loading docks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This way.  I see some lights. Lee and Carter spot a tiny sliver of light coming through MANHOLE COVER.  They start climbing up the metal stairs t lead up to the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blvd.'s packed with PEOPLE and CARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter coming up from the manhole -- standing together in stunned disbelief as they look out at the LAS VEGAS STRIP.  They cover their eyes, blinded by the great light show in the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vegas...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee.  I just got an idea how someone could launder a hundred million dollars in cash. They both turn around and come FACE TO FACE WITH: A TEN-STORY DRAGON.  Fire shoots from its nostrils every SECONDS.  EXT. RED DRAGON HOTEL AND CASINO - NIGHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIRE BALLS BLOW out over the strip as Lee and Carter look at the RED DRAGON.  The HUGE NEON SIGN READS: GRAND OPENI

dialogues.speaker: EVERYBODY'S A WINNER
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter come out of the sewer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was the name of Ricky Tan's boat. Lee and Carter watch as limos pull up to the front of the hotel -- it's like a HOLLYWOOD PREMIERE.  The richest of rich are making their way inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a second.  We can't go in like this.  Look at this place, we gotta look fly.  We gotta Mac out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is Mac out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow me my Asian brother. Carter and Lee start to walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stay down wind, because I think you stepped in some serious rat shit down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter are walking into the upscale clothing stor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they enter, a SALESMAN approaches them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May I help you gentlemen? Carter flashes his biggest smile as he pulls out a stack superbills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black.  42-long.  Nothing touches this body but pure silk.  And get my partner something from the children's department. Carter puts his hand on Lee's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would your partner like silk as well?  I personally like it when a couple matches. Carter takes his hand off Lee's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couple?  No, you got it wrong, there's no couple here.  Just two single police officers working a very dangerous case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  We have lots of big men chasing us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure all the boys are chasing you two.  Don't worry, I'll make you guys the bell of the ball. He WINKS as he walks off, and Carter looks at Lee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the last time I go shopping with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter enter frame, dressed to kill - perfectly tailored couture Versace suits, gold watches, the whole b Le is awkward in "player" guise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, Lee, you're a player now.  You own the place. Carter pulls out his ALTOIDS, and he and Lee each take on they walk through the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I own the place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter STRUTS through the lobby, Lee doing his best to imitate Carter's pimp and roll.  THEY WALK PAST THE GIANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That looks exactly like my Uncle Darrell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buddha is the symbol of luck and good fortune.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buddha is the symbol for fat and lazy.  The man has the biggest tits in Asia. They are moving through the MAIN ENTRY HALL lined with TE COTTA CHINESE SOLDIERS - posed and dressed for battle. RICKSHAWS and BICYCLES take people through the hotel.  Th MAIN CASINO is roped off and empty.  People crowded aroun the perimeter - a sign reads:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: $50,000 buy in -- EVERYBODY'S A WINNER! The LIGHTS DIM - a spotlight comes on and finds STEVEN RE on the balcony overlooking the ENTRANCE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A thousand years ago, a small, wealthy village in China hired a young Dragon to guard their treasure in a cave, hoping to scare off potential bandits.  Their plan worked quite well, until the people of the village started sneaking the Dragon extra food -- hoping to make him bigger and stronger.  The Dragon ate so much and grew so big -- that he eventually got stuck inside the cave -- and the treasure was stuck behind him for all eternity. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, I have found that lost treasure.  It is here, inside the greatest casino in the world!  Welcome to the Red Dragon, where everybody is a winner! Reign smiles, flips a switch -- the CASINO COMES TO LIFE. Fireworks, bright lights, endless rows of tables, dealers waiting. A BAND PLAYS on a stage in the casino lounge. Chinese ACROBATS perform suspended from the ceiling and o the balconies above. Applause all around as the FLAME shoots out of the dragon nostrils and the acrobats perform.  Carter and Lee walk d the red carpet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to waitress)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring us some twelve-year old scotch... (to a cigarette girl)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get us a box of your finest cigars. (to a change girl)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me ten dollars in nickels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dice ROLLING on a craps table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winner!  Seven! We see BLACKJACK DEALERS BUSTING - paying out CUSTOMERS. Hundred dollar slot machines paying out jackpots. GAMBLERS winning all over the casino.  Then going to the cage and exchanging their chips for SUPERBILLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at this place, Lee.  The biggest front in the world. As people pour into the casino, Steven Reign is making hi way through the crowd, shaking hands and posing for pictu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter...here comes the rich white man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait here.  I'll handle this. As Carter walks off, a WOMAN grabs Lee and pulls him onto dance floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman spins to face Lee, her face half-hidden under t dance floor lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put your arms around me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me? Isabella grabs him around the waist, pulls him close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold me close.  There's cameras everywhere. An ASIAN BAND sings STRANGERS IN THE NIGHT as Lee tries h best to slow dance.  An intimate moment between Isabella Lee, her face nestled in the crook of his neck, hiding he face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last time you needed my help I ended up in the back of a truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm undercover.  I had no choice.  You have to trust me. Lee starts to get into the music, moving his hips in a sl sensual rhythm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You move well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just trying to make it look real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look over there.  That's the eye in the sky room. Lee looks over her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind me is the soft count room.  We're pretty sure the plates are back there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you go get them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I'm wrong then my cover is blown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Steven Reign makes his way through the casino, Carter steps right in front of him, giving him a big hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stevie, how's it going my man?  Somebody get a picture, we can use it for a mug shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective Carter, you always seem to show up where you don't belong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lemme ask you something, Steven.  And I want the truth.  Is there any way I can date your daughter?  Just dinner and a movie, maybe go listen to some jazz...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vegas has been my town for 30 years.  I crawled out from under the first rock.  Do you really think you can intimidate me here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right, you're a smart guy.  Most counterfeiters only get ten cents on the dollar.  But this is an even swap.  Pure genius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You play games with me, Detective, and you'll lose every time.  Don't forget.  The odds are always in favor of the house. Reign walks off with his men.  Carter watches him leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee is dancing close with Isabella.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Secret Service almost busted Reign at his casino in Macao, but the place burned down before we could move in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do I know I can trust you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dip me! Lee dips her, holds her in his arms for a long BEAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm asking for real now -- will you help the Secret Service?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'll help you. Lee holds her for a long BEAT, their lips almost touching He finally lets her go, and she disappears into the crowd Carter walks up, sees Lee standing alone on the dance flo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee, what the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dancing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dancing?  I'm out here trying to strong arm Steven Reign, putting my life on the line, and you're up here dancing with some bimbo.  Did she have a friend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was Isabella.  She says the plates are in the soft count room. Lee motions to the room, where WE SEE a SECURITY GUARD standing in front of a small door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isabella?  Are you crazy, man?  She almost got us killed.  She's setting you up again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  I'm going to find out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a second.  There's guards all over the place.  You'll need a distraction. Carter looks around the casino.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll go to the craps table, make a big scene.  When security comes over, you make your move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try to keep them busy for five minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll give it my best shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. CASINO - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter walks up to a CRAPS TABLE, everyone turning to sta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, you're aware that we require a fifty-thousand dollar buy in to gamble here this weekend? Carter throws a HUNDRED THOUSAND in $100 BILLS onto the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw the sign, I can read.  Now gimme a hundred-thousand in chips.  And a Diet Coke and some wash-n-dries.  Let's move, people, I came to play. The DEALER pushes 100K worth of CHIPS in front of Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those are five hundred dollar chips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you give me five-hundred dollar chips because I'm black?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I just assumed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You assumed a brother coming in here can only afford five-hundred dollars a roll, is that right?  Are you a racist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (starting to scream)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone else at the table has thousand dollar chips, but the black man gets the nickel, is that it?  Did my people survive two-hundred years of slavery so you could send us back to the cotton fields with five-hundred dollar chips?  Do I look like Chicken George to you? The PIT BOSS gets on his walkie-talkie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Floor security, we have a problem at table nine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SECURITY GUARD lowers his walkie-talkie, starts movin towards Carter's table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO SECURITY GUARDS approach Carter's table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Answer me one question.  How come Ben Vereen isn't performing here at the hotel?  Is Ben Vereen not good enough for you people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lionel Ritchie is performing here tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lionel Ritchie hasn't been black since the Commodores.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, you're going to have to calm down. Carter watches as Lee moves past the guard and makes his into the soft count room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a dream, where black people and white people can gamble together without getting different chips! A BIG CROWD has gathered as the Security Guards try and p their way through.  The pit boss picks up the phone, call upstairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sing with me!  "We shall overcome!" Carter starts clapping, and the confused crowd joins in a the Security Guards move in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.  Now in the spirit of brotherhood, let's play craps!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee walks into the hallway, moving like a cat as he hugs walls and tries to make his way to the soft count room. He hears noise, TWO SECURITY GUARDS coming behind him thr the casino door.  He has no choice but to crawl over the of a money cart and hug the top.  He lies as still as he trying not to be seen -- until he realizes he's staring directly into the EYE IN THE SKY cameras that are in the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: WE SEE LEE'S FACE
dialogues.text: as he passes directly under the camera, clearly mouthing words "oh shit" as he rolls by. Lee looks to his left, sees the SOFT COUNT ROOM -- a moun of COUNTERFEIT SUPERBILLS that are waiting to be paid out On the opposite side, the REAL MONEY is being WHEELED OUT toward a waiting TRUCK that is parked at the back door. Lee sees two more cameras in the ceiling, knows his cover blown.  He jumps down off the cart, is standing in front the locked vault.  There's no way to get the plates.  Isabella has set him up again. He turns and smiles at the confused SECURITY GUARDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.  How's it going?  You guys have change for a twenty? The GUARDS make their move.  And Lee starts to fight them down the hall, using the cart as a shield as he RAMS into MORE GUARDS, fights them off as he turns the corner towar the casino door -- but he gets slammed to the ground by a right cross. Hu Li threw the punch, a roll of quarters in her hand as stands over him with FIVE TRIAD SOLDIERS.  She holds a kn to Lee's throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open your mouth. She puts the small grenade in Lee's mouth, tapes it shut. She holds the detonator in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing in Chinese)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a ying-tao grenade, Inspector.  Please follow me or I'll blow 32 teeth into your brain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd has gathered behind Carter who is at the table rolling dice, a huge stack of chips in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winner six!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two-hundred thousand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two-hundred thousand dollars?  Who wants a hundred dollars? Carter turns to the MAN next to him, who wears a traditio AFRICAN ROBE and is standing with a giant blonde escort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, your highness, have a hundred dollars.  The Viagra is on me tonight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (South African accent)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am not royalty, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't say that, we're all royalty.  My great grandmammy was Queen Nephertit -- we probably cousins, man.  How much you got on the table?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One million.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we definitely cousins now.  Who wants to blow on my hand for luck? Carter turns to a BIG TEXAN who is standing with a GORGEO YOUNG GIRL who is falling out of her dress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Marlboro man, you mind if your lady blows on my hand for luck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (embarrassed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's not my lady.  She's my niece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I come over for Thanksgiving?  Come on, baby, give me some luck. The GIRL blows on the dice, and Carter stares down at her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice blowing.  When's your next birthday, I'll be the cake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, buddy, watch yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't threaten me.  I got friends in this town that will bite off your ears.  Just sit tight, because I've got the dice and I am on fire! Carter throws the dice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winner, seven! The table erupts as Carter grabs the dice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let it ride!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. UPSTAIRS HALLWAY - NIGHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator doors OPEN and Lee is led toward the eye in sky room by Hu Li and the three Triads.  As they walk int the room, the Triads remain outside guarding the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FORTY VIDEO MONITORS show every inch of the hotel.  A MAN stands in front of the two-way mirror looking down at the casino, the reflection off the glass obscuring his featur Lee has the tape around his mouth and his hands tied behi his back as he's led into the room by Hu Li.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imagine a business where people hand you money.  And you hand them back absolutely nothing. Ricky Tan - alive and well, turns around and stares at Le Isabella is standing next to him.  Lee is shocked at the sight of Ricky Tan alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that's a true American dream.  Thanks to a few pieces of metal and a very greed driven US Customs agent. Ricky Tan walks toward Lee, starts to smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at you, you're ridiculous.  You know it didn't have to be like this.  But it's too bad!  Like father, like son. Lee stares at Isabella for a BEAT.  Hu Li motions to one the monitors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's going for the plates. Ricky Tan looks at one of the MONITORS, sees Steven Reign walking down a hallway, about to walk into the PENTHOUSE SUITE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at this old fool, what does he think he's doing? Ricky Tan shifts his attention back to Lee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's almost impossible to find a partner that's trustworthy and loyal.  Wouldn't you agree, Lee?

dialogues.speaker: ON ANOTHER SCREEN
dialogues.text: We see Carter at the craps table having the time of his l Ricky Tan turns to walk out of the room, motioning to Isabella as he goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, at least you will die with honor.  But choy Gien. SUBTITLES: "Won't see you again."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter has two racks of chips in front of him, a huge cro surrounding him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winner!  Four, winner!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm up a hundred and fifty-grand.  That's a Ferrari.  Do they sell those here in the gift shop?  Somebody cash me out! Several TRIAD SOLDIERS dressed like SECURITY GUARDS appro Carter's table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we'd like to escort you to the cashier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That would be great.  Don't want any of these rich white people to jump me. As they walk toward the door marked "VIP ROOM", Carter glances at the MEN, knows he's in deep shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ricky Tan turns to Hu Li.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chai Hu Li. ("Little Fox")

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have fun. Ricky Tan walks out.  Hu Li holds the detonator up to Lee plays with the button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a few minutes...you'll beg me to push this button. Hu Li pulls her KNIFE, moves towards Lee.  She holds the blade to his face.  About to cut him.  When Isabella pull her gun. Isabella walks toward Lee, whose hands are still tied beh his back.  Hu Li clutches the detonator in one hand, her knife in the other.  She takes a step toward Isabella.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time to end this, Inspector. Isabella cocks the gun, spins back and kicks the detonato from Hu Li's hand -- slamming her against the wall and sticking the gun under her chin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move!  United States Secret Service. Hu Li WHIPS her KNIFE around, catches Isabella across the hand -- the GUN SLIDING across the room near the detonato the TWO WOMEN fight around it. Lee watches them almost step on it - dives to the floor a rolls toward the detonator.  He's about to grab it when:

dialogues.speaker: THE TRIADS OPEN THE DOOR
dialogues.text: They're about to move in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the detonator! The Triads go for the detonator -- as Lee gets to his fee KICKS Hu Li's legs out from under her. One of the Triads about to pick up the detonator - but Le gets to him first.  He fights with one hand tied behind h back. Hu Li and Isabella fight it out in the EYE IN THE SKY ROO Lee gets kicked towards the Eye In The Sky WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two security guards lead Carter away from the table when:

dialogues.speaker: CRASH
dialogues.text: An AIRBORNE Lee rockets through the EYE IN THE SKY WINDOW In a rain of glass, he lands HARD on the casino floor. The NOISE grabs everyone's attention, including:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee!! The guards restrain him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lemme ask you something.  Any of you ever felt $500,000 before? He SLAMS THE RACK OF CHIPS ACROSS THEIR FACES -- chips fl as the GUARDS hit the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't feel so good, does it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hu Li picks up the detonator.  WHACK!  A heeled foot kick from her grasp.  Isabella has recovered!  The detonator F OUT THE BROKEN WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On his back, Lee watches the detonator SAIL OVER HIS HEAD DISAPPEAR into the crowd.  It lands on a DRINK CART.  Bef Lee can get there, a WAITRESS changes trays and carries t detonator on her rounds. Panicked, Lee searches for the detonator.  He JUMPS atop BLACKJACK TABLE to get a better vantage.  He can't see it but he does see:

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE CASINO
dialogues.text: Carter on top of a CRAPS TABLE, keeping security guards a bay with a croupier stick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black man gets on a hot streak and you're all trippin'? Carter and Lee see each other.  They have the same simultaneous though:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (help!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (help!)

dialogues.speaker: MMMMMM
dialogues.text: Carter is Lee's only hope to get the bomb out of his mout But from here to there, a MASS OF PEOPLE.  The quickest w is the HIGH WAY. Lee leaps from TABLE to TABLE.  Scattering playing cards. Reaching the carpeted divide...Lee doesn't stop.  He launches off the bent-over back of a high roller -- landing on a RICKSHAW, SURFING IT to the tables on the ot side. Carter looks around for Lee, catches a glimpse of the Eye the Sky Room.  He grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check it out.  Catfight! POW!  He socks a GUARD in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isabella and Hu Li are locked in battle.  Rolling to the floor, they both see the gun.  They scramble over each ot to get to it first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A security guard CLIMBS on the table to level Carter when arrives.  He kicks the guard off and turns to Carter, his plea MUFFLED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the HELL are you doing with tape on your face? No time to explain -- two more security guards arrive.  K and punches fly, but Lee CAN'T GET HIT IN THE MOUTH!  He and weaves, holding his hands to Carter to untie them in between swings.  Suddenly: BLAM!  BLAM!  BLAM!  GUNSHOTS from the Eye In The Sky Roo Everyone HITS THE DECK.  Carter and Lee dive on to the fl as panic ripples through the Casino.  People FLEE for the EXITS. THE WAITRESS DESERTS HER TRAY.  It gets knocked over and on the floor.  The DETONATOR LANDS feet away from Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This can't be good. Lee's eyes BUG - he sees it too, feet STAMPEDING past it! high heel misses it by a fraction of an inch.  He LUNGES it, manages to CRADLE it in his taped hands when -- WHAM!  He is BUMPED and it FLIES AWAY.  The second it hit the floor, it is KICKED, skittering down the red carpet. ABOVE...the victor emerges in the Eye in the Sky Room.  H STEPS OUT on the PAGODA ROOF and JUMPS DOWN.   The DETONATOR ROLLS right past Hu Li.  As she bends to PI up the detonator, Lee knows he won't get there in time.  Horrified, he SCREAMS at CARTER through the tape. Hu Li lifts the detonator. Carter finally pulls the TAPE OFF Lee's face. Lee SPITS the grenade into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (diving on Carter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bomb!!! Hu Li HITS the TRIGGER just as it lands on a roulette tab

dialogues.speaker: KABOOM
dialogues.text: The table is BLOWN OFF IT'S FOUNDATION.  Chips and cash volcano.  Hu Li is blown backwards by the force of the bl SHEER PANDEMONIUM grips the casino.

dialogues.speaker: AS THE SMOKE CLEARS
dialogues.text: Carter and Lee peer out from behind a row of slot machine The place is deserted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you tell me you had a bomb in your mouth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No you didn't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I did.  I said MMMMMM! A hand on Carter's arm.  THIS IS SERIOUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ricky Tan is alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get to the Penthouse. Lee jumps up, SPRINTS toward the elevators at the dragon of the casino.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on! Carter stuffs his pockets with chips, then races after Le But halfway up the carpet.  Carter stops.  Lee turns to s what is holding him up.   Hu Li SURVIVED the blast and Carter has turned to face he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go after Ricky.  I got this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just GO! Lee turns and runs off past the dragon.  Unfortunately, F TRIADS block his path.  In a flurry of PUNCHES, Lee makes short work of them, and races toward the elevators.

dialogues.speaker: DEAD CENTER ON THE RED CARPET
dialogues.text: Each readying in their own manner.  Hu Li carefully wraps long hair into a bun on top of her head.  Carter stretche flexes, ready to sting like a bee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not gonna hold you back this time just because you're a woman.  I'm gonna pretend you're a man. She pulls off her jacket, prepares to fight him in her undershirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A very beautiful man with a perfect body who I'd like to take to the movies. She takes a sword from a Terra Cotta statue, SWINGS IT AR like a master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I may have been absent the day we went over this in karate class. Quick, Carter reaches for a fighting stick off a Terra Co soldier.  WHOOSH!  She SLICES IT IN HALF.  Carter reaches another.  SLICE!  She's toying with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee's in the elevator as the doors close.  SUDDENLY, a HA cuts through, parting the doors. It's ISABELLA!  A wound on her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm fine. She steps in, too weak and starts to fall.  Lee grabs her holds her in his arms.  HE gently helps her down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't know which side you were on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you know. DING!  The elevator doors open.  Isabella holds up a ROOM - the key to the SUITE.  Lee takes the key, backs away an steps into the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll try to get backup.  Be careful. The elevator doors close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steven Reign is closing the safe.  There are stacks of HUNDRED DOLLAR BILLS on his desk, which he's putting in a black bag along with the plates.  As he turns around, he comes face-to-face with Ricky Tan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: American's love to gamble.  Don't they, Mr. Reign?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm cutting our deal short.  I'm leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And my plates?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stay with me.  I'm sure you won't have a problem with that. Reign shows Tan the gun in his belt.  Grabs the bag and starts to walk toward the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I enjoyed that little story you told about the Dragon and the treasure.  My mother used to tell it to me all the time.  Do you know the moral of that story, Mr. Reign?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Greed will imprison us all. Tan grabs Reign from behind and stabs him with a knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate that fortune cookie shit. Lee BURSTS through the suite door - watches as Reign fall dead to the floor.  Ricky takes the black bag off the des

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the plates down. Ricky Tan looks down at the gun in Reign's belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOSH!  Another Terra Cotta fighting stick is in half in Carter's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you STOP?!?! (picks up cocktail umbrella)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What am I supposed to fight you with? No more toying.  Hu Li CHARGES Carter, who GRABS a ROULET WHEEL as a MAKESHIFT SHIELD.  She SLICES it in HALF!  He' got nowhere to hide. She JABS him with the sword.  Carter SCREAMS.  Falls back against the table, clutching his chest.  Hu Li WINDMILLS, kicking a Terra Cotta soldier on top of Carter, but --

dialogues.speaker: THWACK
dialogues.text: The DOUBLE-BLADED BAMBOO POLE in its hand ricochets back she is PIERCED THROUGH THE SHOULDER with the blade.  Star at Carter in stunned disbelief, she drops to her knees. Carter walks toward her, considers his options, then KICK HER IN THE HEAD, knocking her out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When are you people gonna learn?  Don't mess with the brothas! WEAK in the KNEES, Carter looks to the SOUND ON HIS CHEST reaches through the slice in his jacket.  Instead of a ha covered in blood, it comes out with a THICK WAD OF CASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Benjamin! Carter runs for the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee is walking toward Ricky Tan, the two men circling Rei body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're just like your father, Lee.  All these years hiding behind his badge.  I wanted to help him, to share with him, but he was too afraid of change.  When you think about it, I didn't really kill him.  I just put him out of his misery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the plates down.  It's over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think it's over.  There are casinos all over this country.  Let me make you a rich man, Lee.  Don't make the same mistake he did. Ricky glances at the gun in Reign's belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you reach for that gun, I'm going to kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you remember?  I'm already dead. Ricky makes a play for the gun, but Lee is much too fast, taking the gun and pushing Ricky against the wall just as Carter bursts in the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Ricky, how's it going man?  What's up, Lee? Lee has the gun pressed to Tan's head.  We've never seen like this before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you like me to tell you how your father died?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee, you okay? Lee doesn't respond.  He keeps an eye on Ricky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He never begged for his life.  Or tried to make a deal.  All that he asked me, just seconds before I pulled the trigger, was that I promise not to kill you. Lee's finger is on the trigger -- he wants to pull the trigger but can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee, wait a second.  It's not worth it, man.  He's making you do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's worth it to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have it in you, Lee?  Or are you gonna spend the rest of your life hiding like your father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, Lee.  He's going to jail.  You won, now just put the gun down. Lee is trying to pull the trigger, but he can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I thought. Tan takes the black bag and swings it toward Lee -- the plates hit him across the face and knock him down.

dialogues.speaker: THE GUN IS LOOSE
dialogues.text: Tan reaches for it and is about to pull the trigger when: Lee and Carter come flying at him TOGETHER.  Both KICKING SQUARE IN THE CHEST. Tan falls back, SMASHING THROUGH THE WINDOW.  Lee tries t grab Tan's hand, their fingers touch for a split second. But Tan pulls his hand away and falls 20 STORIES to the street below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TAXI is parked out front.  Tan's BODY SLAMS on the roof

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter are looking down at the street, both relie it's finally over.  Carter puts his hand on Lee's shoulde

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know about you, but I need a wine cooler. As they turn to the door -- Hu Li is walking toward them, bleeding and half-dead.  She has ANOTHER BOMB IN HER HAND This one twice the size of the one from earlier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll go together, Inspector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please tell me she just asked for a ride to the airport. Hu Li hits the switch - starts to smile.  Lee and Carter and RUN for the OPEN WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter DIVE OUT THE WINDOW, grab a cable just as

dialogues.speaker: PENTHOUSE BLOWS
dialogues.text: The FIREBALL SHOOTS out as they start to slide down the s of the hotel. THEY SCREAM AS THE CABLE BREAKS. Lee and Carter SWING toward a HUGE "GRAND OPENING" BANNER They flip under it, do a loop before they SLAM AGAINST TH SIGN. It's KNOCKED LOOSE and they fall with it toward VEGAS BLV Lee and Carter hang on as they drop to the street.  A HUG TRUCK speeds toward them as they hold on for their lives. The entire STRIP SPEEDING toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe I flew ten-thousand miles for this shit!! They lift their feet just as the TRUCK PASSES.  The sign and they fall straight down into the open sunroof of a LA STRETCH LIMO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee and Carter land in the back.  Slam into their seats a try to catch their breath.  The TWO MEN STARTING TO LAUGH when they realize they're alive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We made it, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem. Lee and Carter look up to see the VERSACE SALESMAN and FO OF HIS FRIENDS sitting in the back of the limo staring at them.  The BOYS are all drinking champagne and dressed fo night on the town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there is a God after all. Lee and Carter exchange looks as the limo stops in front the hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we are.  The Red Dragon hotel. In front of the hotel WE SEE FIRE TRUCKS, AMBULANCE, POLI CARS and Isabella and Sterling arresting TWENTY TRIADS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all going gambling and then to see Siegried and Roy.  I hope you two are feeling lucky!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lee is talking with a bandaged Isabella, who is standing Sterling and several other SECRET SERVICE AGENTS.  Lee an Isabella hug goodbye.  As she walks off to board her plan Lee slowly walks back to Carter who is smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw that.  She kissed you, didn't she?  You played it cool, though.  Walking away, never looking back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's going home to New York.  I need some ice. Lee and Carter watch as she gets on the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That your gate down there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm this way.  I guess this is goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess so.  Thank you, Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You take care of yourself, Lee. Carter steps back, BOWS TO LEE.  Lee SHAKES CARTER'S HAND like a brother.  The two men smile.  Turn to walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter, wait.  There's something I want you to have. Lee pulls a BADGE from his pocket.  Hands it to Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father's badge?  No way, man.  I can't take this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay.  I can finally let it go. Carter takes the badge.  Smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In that case, I got something for you.  I picked it up at the hotel. Carter pulls out a WAD OF CASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About fifty grand.  I won it at the tables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Carter.  I can't take this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay, I got lots more. Carter pulls out another wad of cash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They owe us, man.  That's the least they can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This money is evidence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Lee.  Stop being a cop for five minutes and live it up.  There must be something you want. Lee looks back toward Isabella.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always wanted to go to Madison Square Garden.  See the Knicks play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New York City?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First class.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Plaza Hotel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little Mu-shu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some Kung-Pao? They look at each other, smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could use a little vacation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amen to that, brother. As Lee and Carter start to walk away together, the MUSIC SWELLS.  "WAR" starts to PLAY.  They dance their way thro a crowd of people, their arms raised as the two friends m their way through the airport.  END CREDITS
